definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

sentences.english: Until then, the mantle of leadership could well rest with the Karmapa.
sentences.chinese: 那时，藏传佛教的领导者只能依靠大宝法王。

sentences.english: Read and discuss H. H. Penor Rinpoche's amazing Life Story.
sentences.chinese: 阅读并讨论贝诺法王的胜妙传记。

sentences.english: Dharma Cave is said to be the place where King Songtsen Gampo proceeded his religious cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 法王洞据说是地方国王松赞冈波接着他的宗教种植。

sentences.english: It's 200 French francs at today's selling rate.
sentences.chinese: 本日的卖出价是200法功令国法王法郎。

sentences.english: Subsequently, King began performing a cake-cutting, 11 minutes to all participants.
sentences.chinese: 随后，法王开始切蛋糕，一一分给所有与会者。

sentences.english: The First Lord claims that half of the congressmen are under his control.
sentences.chinese: 大法王说，有一半代议士已经被他控制住了。

sentences.english: He then went on to explain that the root of bodhicitta is compassion.
sentences.chinese: 接着法王开始解说菩提心的根源是慈悲心。

sentences.english: These teachings from His Holiness the 17th Karmapa have been edited.
sentences.chinese: 这些来自十七世大宝法王的教授已经过编辑了。

sentences.english: His Holiness gave the oral transmission in order to recite the six syllable mantra.
sentences.chinese: 此前，法王噶玛巴给予了六字大明咒的口传。

sentences.english: Dharma Cave and the Saint's Chapel are the only structures left which were built in seventh century.
sentences.chinese: 法王洞和圣礼拜堂是唯一的结构左边是建于7世纪。

definition: Living Buddha/title of Mongolian Lamas from 17th century
honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
lama, spiritual teacher in Tibetan Buddhism
to keep the law/to protect Buddha's teachings/protector of Buddhist law (i.e. temple donor)
Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
